original_title: Getting Away with Murder: The JonBenét Ramsey Mystery
overview: Dramatization of the story behind the murder of young JonBenet Ramsey. The program provides a concise view of the events surrounding the murder case, as pieced together by detectives and reporters. While the truth about the murder remains a mystery, the program presents the facts of the case, as well as multiple scenarios of the crime and the theories about the identity of the killer(s).
title: Getting Away with Murder: The JonBenét Ramsey Mystery
